blocks.text: The Xiegu G1M (SDR version) is a 5W portable QRP transceiver with SDR structure based on 16-bit CODEC sampling. Features include spectrum display, AM broadcast reception, CW Trainer function with full break-in support, and adaptive speech noise reduction.

Rotate the power/volume switch to turn on or off. After power on, continue rotating to adjust volume. The frequency knob changes the current frequency; light press switches between function menu pages.
Light press LOCK to switch menu pages. Hold LOCK for 2 seconds to lock all button operations. The five multi-function buttons at the bottom correspond to displayed menu functions.
The G1M provides HF continuous reception, support for amateur data communication, and computer online control via the COMM interface.

Light press the main knob to switch between the four menu pages. Each page has five function options corresponding to the multi-function buttons. Short press activates the primary function; hold press activates the secondary function.

blocks.name: MD (Mode)
blocks.description: Short press: cycle through operating modes. Hold press: toggle preamplifier on/off.

blocks.name: B-/B+ (Band)
blocks.description: Short press: decrease/increase band. Hold press: store channel (B-) or clear channel (B+).

blocks.name: TS (Tuning Step)
blocks.description: Short press: select step position. Hold press: step back one position.

blocks.name: A/B
blocks.description: Short press: switch between VFOs. Hold press: switch between frequency and channel mode.

blocks.name: CSN (Call Sign)
blocks.description: Set your call sign for the boot display.

blocks.text: The KEY interface is a 3.5mm stereo jack for manual or automatic telegraph keys. The CW Trainer function supports full QSK break-in operation.

blocks.name: KM (Key Mode)
blocks.description: Set automatic key mode. Hold press adjusts CW sidetone rate.

blocks.name: IMB (Iambic)
blocks.description: Select Iambic A or Iambic B mode. Hold press adjusts code ratio.

blocks.name: QSK
blocks.description: Toggle QSK (full break-in) on/off. Hold press adjusts QSK timing.

blocks.text: The G1M features an 800Hz narrowband CW digital filter for clearer CW reception. Adaptive speech noise reduction improves audio quality in challenging conditions.
The spectrum display shows band activity with adjustable scale (SCL) settings. Use the DIS menu option to select different display modes.
The G1M uses 13.8V external DC power through a 5.5x2.5mm DC socket. The power supply must provide at least 3A current capacity.
Connect the white core wire to positive and metal shielded wire to negative. An EMC magnetic ring on the power line (installed closest to the radio) helps prevent interference.
Carefully check polarity before connection. The limited warranty does not cover damage from external power connection errors or abnormal voltage.
The G1M does not have a built-in automatic antenna tuner. Use an external ATU or resonant antennas matched to 50 ohms.
The BNC antenna interface has 50Ω impedance. Ensure your antenna system presents acceptable SWR before transmitting.

blocks.name: Controls locked
blocks.description: Hold LOCK button for 2 seconds to unlock all button operations.

blocks.name: Spectrum scale too sensitive
blocks.description: Use the SCL menu option to adjust spectrum display scale for current band conditions.

blocks.name: No preamplifier
blocks.description: Hold press the MD (Mode) button to toggle the preamplifier on/off.

blocks.name: System beep
blocks.description: Use the BP menu option to enable or disable the system tone.

blocks.name: Split operation
blocks.description: Use the SPL menu option to configure different frequency transmit/receive operation.
